meanings.definition: A dish made by beating eggs and frying them in a pan.
meanings.sent1: I made an omelette for breakfast this morning.
meanings.sent2: My mom always makes a delicious omelette with cheese and tomatoes.
meanings.sent3: The omelette jumped out of the pan and onto the plate!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as fluffy as a perfectly cooked omelette.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling omelette filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A dish made by beating eggs and adding other ingredients before frying them in a pan.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, I decided to cook a vegetable omelette.
meanings.sent2: The menu at the restaurant offered a variety of omelette options.
meanings.sent3: The omelette wore a tiny hat made of parsley.
meanings.sent4: His words were mixed together like the ingredients in an omelette.
meanings.sent5: The colorful omelette looked like a work of art on the plate.
